SEARCH

Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
public class Game extends Object
This class is the main class, text based adventure game. Users can walk around some scenery. That's all. It should really be extended to make it more interesting! To play this adventure game, see the class GameLauncher. This main class creates and initialises all the others : it creates all rooms, creates the parser and starts the game. It also evaluates and executes the commands that the parser returns.

    • processCommand

      private boolean processCommand(Command command)
      Given a command, process (that is: execute) the command.
      Parameters:
      command - The command to be processed.
      Returns:
      true If the command ends the game, false otherwise.

    • printHelp

      private void printHelp()
      Print out some help information. Here we print some stupid, cryptic message and a list of the command words.

    • goRoom

      private void goRoom(Command command)
      Try to go to one direction. If there is an exit, enter the new room, otherwise print an error message.
      Parameters:
      command - The command to be processed.

    • quit

      private boolean quit(Command command)
      "Quit" was entered. Check the rest of the command to see whether we really quit the game.
      Parameters:
      command - The command to be processed.
      Returns:
      true, if this command quits the game, false otherwise.
